PAGE.TITLE: Basic matrix problems
PAGE.DESCRIPTION: The following problems allow you to practise adding matrices together and multiplying matrices by a scalar.

EXAMPLE.QUESTION: Calculate sum of the following two matrices: $$ \left( \begin{matrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{matrix} \right) + \left( \begin{matrix} e & f \\ g & h \end{matrix} \right) $$
Calculate the following product of a matrix and a scalar, $\alpha$: $$ \alpha \left( \begin{matrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{matrix} \right) $$

EXERCISE.TITLE: Matrix addition
EXERCISE.PROBLEMS:
Do the following matrix addition problems:
$$ \left( \begin{matrix} 1 & 4 \\ 5 & -2 \end{matrix} \right) + \left( \begin{matrix} 7 & 3 \\ 11 & 9 \end{matrix} \right) $$
$$ \left( \begin{matrix} -3 & 4 \\ 6 & 13 \end{matrix} \right) + \left( \begin{matrix} 3 & -8 \\ -2 & 2 \end{matrix} \right) $$
$$ \left( \begin{matrix} 5 & 7 & 9 \\ 3 & -2 & 2 \\ 1 & 0 & 7 \end{matrix} \right) + \left( \begin{matrix} -2 & 5 & -6 \\ 4 & -3 & 5 \\ -1 & \sqrt{3} & 8 \end{matrix} \right) $$
$$ \left( \begin{matrix} -7 & 5 \\ 4 & 3 \end{matrix} \right) + \left( \begin{matrix} -14 & 3 \\ -3 & 1 \end{matrix} \right) $$
$$ \left( \begin{matrix} 1 & 6 & 4 \\ -3 & 8 & 9 \\ -2 & 7 & -1 \end{matrix} \right) + \left( \begin{matrix} -2 & 4 & -1 \\ 4 & -17 & -5 \\ 6 & 1 & 8 \end{matrix} \right) $$
$$ \left( \begin{matrix} 1 & 6 & 4 \\ -3 & 8 & 9 \\ -2 & 7 & -1 \end{matrix} \right) - \left( \begin{matrix} -2 & 4 & -1 \\ 4 & -17 & -5 \\ 6 & 1 & 8 \end{matrix} \right) $$
$$ \left( \begin{matrix} -3 & 4 \\ 6 & 13 \end{matrix} \right) - \left( \begin{matrix} 3 & -8 \\ -2 & 2 \end{matrix} \right) $$
$$ \left( \begin{matrix} 5 & 7 & 9 \\ 3 & -2 & 2 \\ 1 & 0 & 7 \end{matrix} \right) - \left( \begin{matrix} -2 & 5 & -6 \\ 4 & -3 & 5 \\ -1 & \sqrt{3} & 8 \end{matrix} \right) $$
$$ \left( \begin{matrix} 1 & 4 \\ 5 & -2 \end{matrix} \right) - \left( \begin{matrix} 7 & 3 \\ 11 & 9 \end{matrix} \right) $$
